items.sentence: Tom was still alive when the doctor arrived.
Tom used to do that, but he doesn't anymore.
Tom ought to be able to get home by himself.
Tom made me promise not to go there anymore.
Tom looked like he was reluctant to do that.
Tom isn't the only one who knew where I was.
Tom isn't the one who turned off the lights.
Tom is the only one who knew how to do that.
Tom is the one who introduced me to my wife.
Tom has told me he can take care of himself.
Tom has never really tried very hard to win.
Tom drank the orange juice I poured for him.
Tom and I sat next to each other on the bus.
Tom and I don't like the same kind of music.
Tom always leaves for work just before 6:30.
Tom almost killed himself trying to do that.
Tom Jackson is one of my favorite comedians.
Tom wasn't able to persuade Mary to do that.
Tom was impressed by how well Mary did that.
Tom took several pictures of Mary's parents.
